status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

same in 1.61, could not find a bug on it. Reported against Apr 11 2011 17:20 rcb9c6dc4, all supported devices

  1. controls > text area > autolink
  2. note the address is not autolinked (underlined)
  3. tap detect address.

results: address is not underlined and does not invoke map on touch

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: Detect Address button does not work

comments.body: Closing ticket as Invalid as there is little information on what the issue is and the last activity was over 6 years ago.
